001package edu.pdx.cs.joy.whitlock;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs.joy.lang.Human;
004
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006                                                                                    
007/**                                                                                 
008 * This class is represents a <code>Student</code>.                                 
009 */                                                                                 
010public class Student extends Human {                                                
011                                                                                    
012  /**                                                                               
013   * Creates a new <code>Student</code>                                             
014   *                                                                                
015   * @param name                                                                    
016   *        The student's name                                                      
017   * @param classes                                                                 
018   *        The names of the classes the student is taking.  A student              
019   *        may take zero or more classes.                                          
020   * @param gpa                                                                     
021   *        The student's grade point average                                       
022   * @param gender                                                                  
023   *        The student's gender ("male", "female", or "other", case insensitive)
024   */                                                                               
025  public Student(String name, ArrayList<String> classes, double gpa, String gender) {
026    super(name);
027    throwIllegalArgumentExceptionIfNumber(name);
028    throwNegativeGpaExceptionIfNegative(gpa);
029  }
030
031  private void throwNegativeGpaExceptionIfNegative(double gpa) {
032    if (gpa < 0.0) {
033      throw new NegativeGpaException();
034    }
035
036  }
037
038  private void throwIllegalArgumentExceptionIfNumber(String string) {
039    try {
040      Integer.parseInt(string);
041      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Name cannot be a number");
042
043    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
044      // Name is not a valid number.  That's good.
045    }
046
047  }
048
049  /**                                                                               
050   * All students say "This class is too much work"
051   */
052  @Override
053  public String says() {                                                            
054    return "This class is too much work";
055  }
056                                                                                    
057  /**                                                                               
058   * Returns a <code>String</code> that describes this                              
059   * <code>Student</code>.                                                          
060   */                                                                               
061  public String toString() {
062    return " \"" + says() + "\".";
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Main program that parses the command line, creates a
067   * <code>Student</code>, and prints a description of the student to
068   * standard out by invoking its <code>toString</code> method.
069   */
070  public static void main(String[] args) {
071    if (args.length == 0) {
072      System.err.println("** Missing command line arguments");
073      return;
074    }
075
076    String gpaString = args[2];
077    double gpa;
078    try {
079      gpa = Double.parseDouble(gpaString);
080
081    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
082      System.err.println("GPA \"" + gpaString + "\" is not a number between 0.0 and 4.0");
083      return;
084    }
085
086    ArrayList<String> classes = new ArrayList<>();
087    try {
088      new Student("Name", classes, gpa, "GENDER");
089
090    } catch (NegativeGpaException ex) {
091      System.err.println("Please enter a valid GPA.");
092    }
093
094  }
095
096  public static class NegativeGpaException extends RuntimeException {
097  }
098}
